data.name: Kombinera OST
data.detailed_description:
There exists a world the 3rd dimension has yet to reach. Here, in the Kingdom of Kombinera, there have been whispers of mutinous revolt over the powers that be. Ruling over this *normally* peaceful and round people is King Kombine, wielder of infinite power from his infinite sides. These are the melodies of the king...

All tracks are provided in mp3 and WAV format, and will be available in a folder within your game folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 28 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 205 MB available space
